text: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ جِئْنَـٰكَ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَمْتَرُونَ

translation.en.sahih: They said, "But we have come to you with that about which they were disputing,
translation.id.indonesian: Para utusan menjawab: "Sebenarnya kami ini datang kepadamu dengan membawa azab yang selalu mereka dustakan.
